name: Sama Gamal El-din
short: I'm a creative web and game developer

sub.title: Summary
sub.content: Motivated student with strong technical and soft skills. Skilled in web development (HTML, CSS, PHP), data analysis, and digital marketing tools. Excellent public speaking, presentation, and time management abilities. A proactive team player with leadership experience and a passion for continuous growth and learning.

content.title: Egyptain Food Bank
content.text:
Food Relief Volunteer
- Assisted in preparing, packaging, and cooking meals for distribution to families in need.
 - Organization and sorted food supplies, ensuring efficient packing and accurate distribution.

content.text:
Participation & Project Champion

- Calm Roots: a mental health awareness website, developed by a team of 5.

- Ranked top champion in the physical sessions and among the top 3 participants online.
- Developed critical skills in leadership, teamwork, public speaking, and project management.
- Met course goals and achieved good marks with diligent completion of assignment.

content.title: Gaming Website
content.text:
This Gaming Hub is an interactive website designed to bring gamers together, offering a variety of gaming-related content, forums, and resources. Built with HTML, CSS, PHP, and SQL, this platform allows users to create accounts, engage in discussions, and track their gaming progress. The site features a dynamic database for user management, game reviews, and recommendations, all powered by SQL for efficient data handling. With a focus on user experience, the site integrates PHP for seamless functionality, including user sessions and data validation, ensuring secure and personalized interactions.This Gaming Hub is an interactive website designed to bring gamers together, offering a variety of gaming-related content, forums, and resources. Built with HTML, CSS, PHP, and SQL, this platform allows users to create accounts, engage in discussions, and track their gaming progress. The site features a dynamic database for user management, game reviews, and recommendations, all powered by SQL for efficient data handling. With a focus on user experience, the site integrates PHP for seamless functionality, including user sessions and data validation, ensuring secure and personalized interactions.


Skills: PHP Â· HTML5 Â· Cascading Style Sheets (CSS) Â· MySQL

content.title: Snake Game
content.text:
I originally built a classic Snake game using Python and the turtle library, leveraging my expertise in Python development. However, to make it more accessible on the web and refine my JavaScript skills, I rewrote the game using JavaScript and the Canvas API. This transition allowed for seamless rendering, improved interactivity, and the ability to share it effortlessly online.
To enhance the game experience, I incorporated:
- Smooth animations with optimized frame rates for fluid gameplay.
- Dynamic food mechanics, where different food types offer unique effectsâ€”speed boosts, size reductions, or bonus points.
- Customizable themes, allowing players to switch colors, grid styles, or even add a retro pixel aesthetic.
- Responsive controls, supporting keyboard, touch gestures, and gamepad input for versatility.
- Leaderboards, so players can track high scores, adding a competitive element.
- Adaptive difficulty, where the snake's speed scales based on score or elapsed time.

This evolution from a simple Python-based game to an interactive, web-friendly JavaScript application reflects my growth in development and commitment to expanding my skill set. Iâ€™d love to keep refining it with additional featuresâ€”maybe multiplayer support or AI-generated obstacles! ðŸš€
